charmList.name: Dossoles Tourist Badge
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A button badge given by Dossoles to foreign tourists entering the city. The attentive may notice that so long as you go shopping with this on, everything grows a little more expensive.

runeData.description: Gain 4 additional DP when carrying this into stage

charmList.charmEffect: Gain 4 additional DP when carrying this into stage

charmList.name: Box Inc. Resistant Paint
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A civilian product by the large Victorian industrial firm Box (though presumably, some similar Columbian business co-opted it as a figurehead a long while ago).

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators recover 25 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators recover 25 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A new model of civilian product by the large Victorian industrial firm Box (though for being a Victorian corporation, its headquarters are based in Columbia).

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators recover 50 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators recover 50 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Reliable, durable goods by the Columbian heavy-duty manufacturers Dogruss. A brand product you'll find even in small-scale nomadic settlements out in Sami.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators recover 25 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators recover 25 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Reliable, durable goods by the Columbian heavy-duty manufacturers Dogruss. Their industrial version's even better, but watch out—it's highly toxic!

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators recover 50 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators recover 50 points of Corrosion Damage per second

charmList.name: Chico Tequila
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A cheap distilled liquor brand found anywhere in modern Bolívar, strong-flavored, a wide favorite of the country's poor folk.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have lower ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have lower ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.name: Chico Añejo Tequila
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A new product created by Destilería Chico for the high-end market, but Bolívar's rich would rather die than drink from the same brand as the poor, so sales have been poor to say the least.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators no longer have ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators no longer have ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.name: Anton Tequila
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Anton is a high-quality liquor brand familiar to most in Bolívar, the company well-known for their dependence on their relationship with the Singas government.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have lower ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have lower ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A bestseller from Destilería Anton, made with excellent ingredients and top-notch craftsmanship. For a gift to your guests, there's no other choice!

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators no longer have ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators no longer have ASPD reduction under 'Erosion'

charmList.name: Regal Liqueur
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: An imitation brand of royal liqueur. Its proprietor claims to be descended from Gauls, but everyone knows he was just a coalition government army grunt who fled.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +20% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +20% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.name: Regal Champagne
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: The proprietor claims he discovered this Gaul liqueur's name and brewing technique from Gaul's own history books. Whether it's the truth or not, the brand has undeniably found a cachet with the upper classes.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +40% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +40% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A well-known Leithanian sparkling wine manufacturer. A common sight throughout Leithanien, this wine initially got a cold reception in Dossoles, but nowadays enjoys wide acceptance.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +20% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +20% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.name: Valentia Cava

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: The inspiration for this special sparkling wine seems to have come from past vestiges of Iberia left in Bolívar, its flavor often described as remarkably similar to the Regal Champagne.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +40% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +40% ATK under 'Erosion'

charmList.name: Cerveza
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A brand of beer created by the Dossoles government themselves. Between it and every kind of high-class liquor, when you're in a city full of party fever, beer's always been the eternal winner with the people.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +20% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +20% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A limited line released yearly to accompany the Dossoles Warrior Champion. Only up for sale while the championship's on, but nothing at all separates its flavor from the normal kind.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +40% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +40% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A brand of craft beer that's a relative standout from all the rest. Feedos positions themselves as just a little higher-grade stuff than normal beer, and needless to say, it's a direction that's given them a solid foothold.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +20% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +20% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: One of Feedos' many lines of beer and one that's done quite well for itself, praised by draft-lovers as 'the fresh fruit of all beer.'

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +40% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +40% DEF under 'Erosion'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Why is this celebrated traveling fast food shop called Bandidos? The main reason is... the founder used to actually be a bandit.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +100 ATK

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +100 ATK

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Repeatedly name-dropped in Columbian tourist magazines, a must-have special meal at Bandidos, limited in supply and first-come, first-served.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +200 ATK

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +200 ATK

charmList.name: Sombrero Dude Taco
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: The owner was once an army chef for the True Bolívarians, and post-dischargement, came to Dossoles to start up his venture. This restaurant has no fixed outlet—these snack stands scatter all across the urban planning of Dossoles. If you want to eat there, it'll have to be fated to be.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +100 ATK

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +100 ATK

charmList.name: Sombrero Dude Burrito
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Sombrero Dude's investor is a firm from Columbia called the 'Maylander Association,' and rumors say quite a few of the cooks are Columbian intelligence agents.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +200 ATK

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +200 ATK

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A brand local to Dossoles. A worker's most frequent food supply. Rapidly filling when paired with boiled water, but fairly void of flavor.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +100 DEF

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +100 DEF

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: In order to contend against Tio Marco releasing his own products, Uncle Marco added even more industrial seasonings, with a price premium to match. This, surprisingly, resulted in nobody really buying it.

runeData.description: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +200 DEF

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster, Sniper, Supporter and Medic Operators have +200 DEF

charmList.name: Tio Marco Dried Cactus
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: An imitation brand of Uncle Marco, with all sorts of additional industrial seasonings considerably improving the flavor, and thus gradually overtaking Uncle Marco himself in popularity.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +100 DEF

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +100 DEF

charmList.name: Tio Marco Cactus Cake
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A product released by Tio Marco to further seize Uncle Marco's market, but owing to a lack of proper market research, it ultimately fell flat and nobody blinked twice.

runeData.description: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +200 DEF

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender, Guard, Vanguard and Specialist Operators have +200 DEF

charmList.name: 'Margarita'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: The most classic and most popular of all mixed drinks in Dossoles, a common sight anywhere, recommended to everyone who's just arrived at this city.

runeData.description: All Specialist Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Specialist Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Pink Señorita'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: This cocktail is touted by the meddlesome as a fine representative of the sensuality and cute factor of Dossoles. The most frequent sight in any gathering of young people.

runeData.description: All Defender Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Marble Queen'

charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: A mixed drink of thoroughly refined appearance, and a frequent guest at all sorts of dinner party. They say a Leithanian noble gave it its name.

runeData.description: All Guard Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Guard Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Sloe'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Also known as 'the Dossoles Bloody Mary,' as the name entails, it's even more popular here than the Bloody Mary itself.

runeData.description: All Vanguard Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Vanguard Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Sunrise'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Tumbling layers of red and yellow. Just as brightly vivid as the name Dossoles itself. Ms. Candela's most favored mixed drink.

runeData.description: All Medic Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Medic Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Honey Bee'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Want something for your sweet tooth? Then this is the one. A cocktail blended with the flavor of honey, sour yet sweet, crisp and refreshing.

runeData.description: All Caster Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Caster Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Mockingman'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Inspired by 'To Kill the Mockingman,' a novel that once caused a stir in Columbia. If you've never read it, do it. C'mon.

runeData.description: All Sniper Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Sniper Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: 'Slammer'
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: It's not common to see by any means, but if you and your friend want to make a bet, tell the bartender this is the cocktail you want, and they'll give you a very approving look.

runeData.description: All Supporter Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.charmEffect: All Supporter Operators can be deployed on tiles currently flooded by High Tide

charmList.name: Scharzhof Coating Device Starter Pack
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: 'We'll take you to harmless waters to take risks like never before!' That's the tagline Scharzhof uses. It has to be said, for the people who actually have an interest in but flinch at the underwater, there's some draw in it.

runeData.description: Gain 1 additional 'Erosion-Resistant Coating Application Device' during operation

charmList.charmEffect: Gain 1 additional 'Erosion-Resistant Coating Application Device' during operation

charmList.name: Scharzhof Advanced Coating Device
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: With its help, you'll be all set to perfectly experience the 'seabed landscapes' of Dossoles. Of course, these landscapes are only imaginations of a sort, the city planners' picturings of the sea informed by left-behind documents from Iberia.

runeData.description: Gain 2 additional 'Erosion-Resistant Coating Application Device' during operation

charmList.charmEffect: Gain 2 additional 'Erosion-Resistant Coating Application Device' during operation

charmList.name: Scharzhof Professional Coating Device
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: It looks to be an exceptionally specialist coating device, theoretically able to prevent anyone from being eroded by the sea for a whole month, but given that nobody would ever even volunteer to do so, a show of technology has instead been relegated to the display window.

runeData.description: Gain 3 additional 'Erosion-Resistant Coating Application Device' during operation

charmList.charmEffect: Gain 3 additional 'Erosion-Resistant Coating Application Device' during operation

charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Coffee Plain, a household name native to Dossoles, is devoted to giving its customers great flavor variety and high quality in their coffee. They also provide all kinds of powers with apex weaponry.

runeData.description: All Defender Operators gain 10% more Trust after clearing a stage

charmList.charmEffect: All Defender Operators gain 10% more Trust after clearing a stage

charmList.name: Coffee Plain Mocha
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers for products that Ernesto tasked Ch'en with collecting in the city, providing her different custom weaponry services for each kind. Ernesto will also take surplus ones, which he'll offer to other collectors for cheap.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Coffee Plain, a household name native to Dossoles, is devoted to giving its customers great flavor variety and high quality in their coffee. They also provide all kinds of powers with apex weaponry.

charmList.name: Gold Chip
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers difficult for Ernesto to do anything with, whether for their lower value, or the difficulty in selling them. But at least he's willing to pay out of his own pocket for them.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Valid at all great casinos in Dossoles, one token out of a vast amount issued. For swindling tourists who don't know the truth—that's probably a safe guess...

runeData.description: Due to the extreme ease in acquiring this, it has low collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.

charmList.charmEffect: Due to the extreme ease in acquiring this, it has low collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.

charmList.name: Error Coin
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers difficult for Ernesto to do anything with, whether for their lower value, or the difficulty in selling them. But at least he's willing to pay out of his own pocket for them.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: An alloyed coin issued in Dossoles' early years. A whole run of currency was misprinted thanks to an error on the mint's part, but it's gained quite the adulation in collectors' hands.

runeData.description: Due to the ease in acquiring this, it has low collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.

charmList.charmEffect: Due to the ease in acquiring this, it has low collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.

charmList.name: Dossoles Big Lottery
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers difficult for Ernesto to do anything with, whether for their lower value, or the difficulty in selling them. But at least he's willing to pay out of his own pocket for them.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Who's won the jackpot? Me, of course! It's Dossoles' biggest ever first prize in any lottery, so come on, try your luck!

runeData.description: Due to the difficulty in acquiring this, it has high collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.

charmList.charmEffect: Due to the difficulty in acquiring this, it has high collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.

charmList.name: Court Emeraldia Premium
charmList.itemUsage: Stickers difficult for Ernesto to do anything with, whether for their lower value, or the difficulty in selling them. But at least he's willing to pay out of his own pocket for them.
charmList.itemDesc: People who collect these don't rank that high among the pantheon of collectors, really. Never underestimate just how bored people can get.
charmList.desc: Of all the outstanding coffee that Court Emeraldia tailors to the upper-class clientele, this is their highest grade. Precious beyond simple price, only those with the most authority are qualified to acquire it.

runeData.description: Due to the extreme difficulty in acquiring this, it has high collection value. Please note that this has no modification effects and can only be recycled.
